div.a: WCSD COVID-19 Short Term Family Plan 3/16/2020

div.h2: WCSD COVID-19 Short Term Family Plan 3/16/2020

nav.div: Washington Community Schools » News » What's New » WCSD COVID-19 Short Term Family Plan 3/16/2020

div.div: WCSD COVID-19 Short Term Family Plan 3/16/2020

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.style: margin: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 11px; line-height: normal; font-family: Helvetica;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: It goes without saying we have entered uncharted territory with the current situation involving COVID-19. We understand how difficult extended school closures can impact our community. We are working diligently to ensure we are doing as much as possible to support our students and families. The following is what we are able to communicate at this time and we will continue to communicate as updates are available.

p.style: margin: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 11px; line-height: normal; font-family: Helvetica;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: All Washington Community School District buildings and facilities will be closed until further notice. Parents and students needing to pick up personal items or materials from the school, please call your child’s school building on Tuesday, March 17th, 2020 between the hours of 8:00 am and 12:00 pm. School personnel will gather the materials to be picked up between the hours of 12:00 pm-4:00 pm. Prior to pickup, please call the school and someone will bring the materials to your vehicle at the designated building location. After this time-frame, families will be unable to access personal items in the schools until further notice.

p.style: margin: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 11px; line-height: normal; font-family: Helvetica;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Lunches will be provided for students at three sites starting Tuesday, March 17, 2020, and again on Thursday, March 19, 2020. Two lunches per student will be provided on each of these days. Lunch sites will be open at Stewart, Lincoln and at the Brighton bus stop. Lunches will be ready for pick-up at the sites during the hours of 11:00 am and 12:30 pm. We ask that you stay in your vehicles and the meals will be brought to your vehicle. Please look for further notification on future lunch plans.

p.style: margin: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 11px; line-height: normal; font-family: Helvetica;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: We will make a decision on food pantries over the next few days. If you are in need of food from one of our food pantries, please contact the building on Tuesday, March 17th between the hours of 8:00 am-4:00 pm and we will arrange a time for food pick-up for your family.

p.style: margin: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 11px; line-height: normal; font-family: Helvetica;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: At this time we are focused on making sure that our students’ basic needs are met. More information will come on what we will be providing for academic enrichment or instruction as we begin to get more guidance from the state.

p.style: margin: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 11px; line-height: normal; font-family: Helvetica;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Thank you for your continued patience and support as we work through this new territory.

p.style: margin: 0px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 11px; line-height: normal; font-family: Helvetica;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: No hace falta decir que hemos entrado en territorio desconocido con la situación actual que involucra COVID-19. Entendemos cuán difíciles pueden ser los cierres de escuelas extendidas en nuestra comunidad. Estamos trabajando diligentemente para asegurarnos de que estamos haciendo todo lo posible para apoyar a nuestros estudiantes y familias. Lo siguiente es lo que podemos comunicar en este momento y continuaremos comunicándonos a medida que haya actualizaciones disponibles.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Todos los edificios e instalaciones del Distrito Escolar Comunitario de Washington estarán cerrados hasta nuevo aviso. Padres y estudiantes que necesiten recoger artículos personales o materiales de la escuela, por favor llame al edificio de la escuela de su hijo el martes 17 de marzo de 2020 entre las 8:00 a.m. y las 12:00 p.m. El personal de la escuela reunirá los materiales que se recogerán entre las 12:00 p.m. y las 4:00 p.m. Antes de la recogida, llame a la escuela y alguien llevará los materiales a su vehículo en la ubicación designada del edificio. Después de este plazo, las familias no podrán acceder a artículos personales en las escuelas hasta nuevo aviso.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Se proporcionarán almuerzos para los estudiantes en tres sitios a partir del martes 17 de marzo de 2020 y nuevamente el jueves 19 de marzo de 2020. Se proporcionarán dos almuerzos por estudiante en cada uno de estos días. Los sitios de almuerzo estarán abiertos en Stewart, Lincoln y en la parada de autobús de Brighton. Los almuerzos estarán listos para ser recogidos en los sitios durante las horas de 11:00 am y 12:30 pm. Le pedimos que permanezca en sus vehículos y las comidas serán llevadas a su vehículo. Busque más notificaciones sobre futuros planes de almuerzo.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Tomaremos una decisión sobre las despensas de alimentos en los próximos días. Si necesita alimentos de una de nuestras despensas de alimentos, comuníquese con el edificio el martes 17 de marzo entre las 8:00 a.m. y las 4:00 p.m. y organizaremos un horario para la recogida de alimentos para su familia .

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: En este momento estamos enfocados en asegurarnos de que se satisfagan las necesidades básicas de nuestros estudiantes. A medida que comencemos a obtener más orientación del estado, obtendremos más información sobre lo que proporcionaremos para enriquecimiento académico o instrucción.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Gracias por su continua paciencia y apoyo mientras trabajamos en este nuevo territorio.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
